programme.title: Small Apartments
Sekrety małych mieszkań
Small Apartments
programme.desc:
Small Apartments: Directed by Jonas Åkerlund. With Matt Lucas, James Caan, Nugget, Juno Temple. A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272886/","name":"Small Apartments","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDIwNjk5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDMxMzY0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"harveer_chauhan"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small apartments and apparently smaller lives but not so small a lesson!","reviewBody":"This movie is weird and disturbing movie when it starts but by the end it proves true to the purpose it is intended to have. The lives of the residents of an apartment building change when the owner is accidentally killed by one of the inhabitant. It take a while to get the hang of the pulse of the movie and it requires a lot of patience. The main protagonist is a loner and a voyeur who misses his ill(mentally) brother from whom he gets his taped messages. Meanwhile he is trying to dispose off the dead body of the owner. 

You do not fall in love with its characters or empathize with them but it definitely scares you to see their lives and you pray not to end up like them. But there are few moments when you feel sad for the people portrayed who are stuck in their little world and have distant hopes of escape from it. This movie forces you to confront or at least acknowledge the alienation,apathy,and surrender of some in the modern society who live on it fringe with little expectation of any worthwhile impact on anyone's life other than their own. But still it leaves you with a nice little message about forgiveness , family and the meaning of a well lived life.

You are not going to remember this movie for long but it's decently directed eerie movie for a select few who are patient enough to take a lesson home.

PS: Watch at your own risk.Either you will hate it or you will applaud the efforts for such a real depiction of lives in small apartments!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"punched in the stomach,scene of the crime,fellatio,landlord,talking to oneself in a mirror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1273603865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Franklin Franklin plays the alphorn and dreams of Switzerland. His crazy brother sends him fingernail clippings in the mail. One of his neighbors is a forgetful pot-head, the other a gruff busybody who doesn't miss anything. Across the street live a mother and her fifteen-year-old daughter, whom he likes to watch from his window, but none of these are Franklin's real problem. His real problem is that his landlord is dead, laid out on the linoleum of his kitchen, and Switzerland seems farther away all the time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524240/","name":"Matt Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959774/","name":"Jonas Åkerlund"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2411346/","name":"Chris Millis"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1272886, Title: Small Apartments, --- Description: Small Apartments: Directed by Jonas Åkerlund. With Matt Lucas, James Caan, Nugget, Juno Temple. A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272886/","name":"Small Apartments","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDIwNjk5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDMxMzY0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272886/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"harveer_chauhan","dateCreated":"2013-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small apartments and apparently smaller lives but not so small a lesson!","reviewBody":"This movie is weird and disturbing movie when it starts but by the end it proves true to the purpose it is intended to have. The lives of the residents of an apartment building change when the owner is accidentally killed by one of the inhabitant. It take a while to get the hang of the pulse of the movie and it requires a lot of patience. The main protagonist is a loner and a voyeur who misses his ill(mentally) brother from whom he gets his taped messages. Meanwhile he is trying to dispose off the dead body of the owner. 

You do not fall in love with its characters or empathize with them but it definitely scares you to see their lives and you pray not to end up like them. But there are few moments when you feel sad for the people portrayed who are stuck in their little world and have distant hopes of escape from it. This movie forces you to confront or at least acknowledge the alienation,apathy,and surrender of some in the modern society who live on it fringe with little expectation of any worthwhile impact on anyone's life other than their own. But still it leaves you with a nice little message about forgiveness , family and the meaning of a well lived life.

You are not going to remember this movie for long but it's decently directed eerie movie for a select few who are patient enough to take a lesson home.

PS: Watch at your own risk.Either you will hate it or you will applaud the efforts for such a real depiction of lives in small apartments!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"punched in the stomach,scene of the crime,fellatio,landlord,talking to oneself in a mirror","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1273603865","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Franklin Franklin plays the alphorn and dreams of Switzerland. His crazy brother sends him fingernail clippings in the mail. One of his neighbors is a forgetful pot-head, the other a gruff busybody who doesn't miss anything. Across the street live a mother and her fifteen-year-old daughter, whom he likes to watch from his window, but none of these are Franklin's real problem. His real problem is that his landlord is dead, laid out on the linoleum of his kitchen, and Switzerland seems farther away all the time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524240/","name":"Matt Lucas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959774/","name":"Jonas Åkerlund"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337652/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139919/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374424/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2411346/","name":"Chris Millis"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Superbad: Directed by Greg Mottola. With Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Bill Hader. Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0829482/","name":"Superbad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NjIyMjA2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNDE1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0829482/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impressive","reviewBody":"Normally I don't like this kind of film about teenagers trying to act like adults, but this film really works. programme.title: Small Apartments
Sekrety małych mieszkań
Small Apartments
programme.desc:
Small Apartments: Directed by Jonas Åkerlund. With Matt Lucas, James Caan, Nugget, Juno Temple. A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272886/","name":"Small Apartments","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDIwNjk5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDMxMzY0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"harveer_chauhan"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small apartments and apparently smaller lives but not so small a lesson!","reviewBody":"This movie is weird and disturbing movie when it starts but by the end it proves true to the purpose it is intended to have. The lives of the residents of an apartment building change when the owner is accidentally killed by one of the inhabitant. It take a while to get the hang of the pulse of the movie and it requires a lot of patience. The main protagonist is a loner and a voyeur who misses his ill(mentally) brother from whom he gets his taped messages. Meanwhile he is trying to dispose off the dead body of the owner. 

You do not fall in love with its characters or empathize with them but it definitely scares you to see their lives and you pray not to end up like them. But there are few moments when you feel sad for the people portrayed who are stuck in their little world and have distant hopes of escape from it. This movie forces you to confront or at least acknowledge the alienation,apathy,and surrender of some in the modern society who live on it fringe with little expectation of any worthwhile impact on anyone's life other than their own. But still it leaves you with a nice little message about forgiveness , family and the meaning of a well lived life.

You are not going to remember this movie for long but it's decently directed eerie movie for a select few who are patient enough to take a lesson home.

PS: Watch at your own risk.Either you will hate it or you will applaud the efforts for such a real depiction of lives in small apartments!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"punched in the stomach,scene of the crime,fellatio,landlord,talking to oneself in a mirror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1273603865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Franklin Franklin plays the alphorn and dreams of Switzerland. His crazy brother sends him fingernail clippings in the mail. One of his neighbors is a forgetful pot-head, the other a gruff busybody who doesn't miss anything. Across the street live a mother and her fifteen-year-old daughter, whom he likes to watch from his window, but none of these are Franklin's real problem. His real problem is that his landlord is dead, laid out on the linoleum of his kitchen, and Switzerland seems farther away all the time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524240/","name":"Matt Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959774/","name":"Jonas Åkerlund"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2411346/","name":"Chris Millis"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mardi Gras: Spring Break
Mardi Gras: Ostatki na ostro
Mardi Gras: Spring Break
programme.desc: Mardi Gras: Spring Break: Directed by Phil Dornfeld. With Nicholas D'Agosto, Josh Gad, Bret Harrison, Arielle Kebbel. A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1083462/","name":"Mardi Gras: Spring Break","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk5NTQ1MDI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzM5Njk4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1083462/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"derhonk01"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"8.1 - Are you kidding me??","reviewBody":"OK the only reason I write this review is because of the Rating here on this site. Normally I find the ratings on IMDb very reliable. Most of the time it is a good tool to differentiate good movies from crappy ones and the ratings correlate with my own taste in general. So i tend so sometimes watch movies which got a good rating on IMDb although they wouldn't appeal to me otherwise. And very often I had a pleasant surprise and found really good flicks that I wouldn't even have noticed otherwise. Not in this case. At the time I'm writing this the movie has a rating of 8.1 which is already very very good if you consider that classics like Gone with the wind or Good Will Hunting are rated equally high. So I decided to watch it solely because of the good rating and was extremely disappointed to have wasted about 90 minutes on this piece of garbage. It is a mediocre movie at the very best and I wouldn't even go that far. I have no idea how such a flick can get an 8.1. Maybe all the actors and their their entire families gave it a 10. I don't know and I don't care. My only motivation to deal with this movie a little longer than the 90 minutes it lasted is to prevent others from making the same mistake I did. So here is my review that says everything there is to say about this flick: THIS IS NOT A GOOD MOVIE. STORY AND ACTING ARE WAY BELOW AVERAGE. ITS NOT FUNNY OR VERY ENTERTAINING AND THE RATING OF 8.1 IS COMPLETELY UNDESERVED!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5852,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-09-23","keywords":"mardi gras,public nudity,sex tape,female nudity,bloopers during credits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"US Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3994000409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTE4MTk4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTAxMDE1Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTE4MTk4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTAxMDE1Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194900/","name":"Nicholas D'Agosto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1265802/","name":"Josh Gad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365501/","name":"Bret Harrison"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233917/","name":"Phil Dornfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097246/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0230335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118054/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372222/","name":"Josh Heald"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Think Like a Man

Think Like a Man
programme.desc: Think Like a Man: Directed by Tim Story. With Michael Ealy, Jerry Ferrara, Meagan Good, Regina Hall. Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1621045/","name":"Think Like a Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc4NDg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzNDAxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1621045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cattjones"},"dateCreated":"2012-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Kevin Hart Show","reviewBody":"I am sure that a lot of folks will think that this is a film to plug Steve Harvey's book, but trust me when I say that the book does not need plugging since it made the best seller list (just wanted to get that off my chest). This is one of those films that I am going to have to watch again because the audience was laughing so loud and long that I fear I missed some of the jokes. That being said .. Kevin Hart (Cedric) is a fool (in a good way). He had me (and the rest of the audience) cracking up. His comic timing and expressions are priceless. The relationship between Dominic (Michael Ealy) and Lauren (Taraji P Henson) was probably the most honest (compared to the others). I like the reference that they made to For Colored Girls (classic). I have always considered Michael Ealy to be very sexy and he did not disappoint in this film (Yum). Michael (Terrance Jenkins) was a true mama's boy almost to the point of being sickening, but Candace (Regina Hall) did what she had to do to rectify that situation. The longtime relationship between Jeremy (Jerry Ferrara) and Kristen (Gabrielle Union) is one that a lot of couples will be able to relate to. Finally, Zeke (Romany Malco) . What can I say, there are a bunch of you out there and I am glad that Mya (Meagan Good) stuck to her guns. The only negative thing that I would say about the film is that I am not sure that Alex (Chris Brown) needed to keep popping in on the scenes. It was kind of redundant since the film already had a "playa". Wendy Williams (Gail) and Sherri Shephard (Vicki) had small roles in the film, but it was good to see the talk show hosts represent. I think that a lot of people may see this film as a "chick flick", but I like to think of it as a great date movie. I think that the implied war of the sexes will appeal to all and if nothing else, Kevin Hart will keep you in stitches. This film is well worth the price of a ticket. Put down the book and get out and see this film because this will be the one that they will be talking about next to the water cooler on Monday. I am giving this film a green light.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45842,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-07-11","keywords":"animated credits,four word title,african american,african american protagonist,interracial friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3746799129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2093097/","name":"Chris Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1103162/","name":"Tim Story"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045552/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0146485/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226647/","name":"Keith Merryman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226970/","name":"David A. Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367724/","name":"Steve Harvey"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1621045/","name":"Think Like a Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc4NDg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzNDAxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1621045/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cattjones","dateCreated":"2012-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Kevin Hart Show","reviewBody":"I am sure that a lot of folks will think that this is a film to plug Steve Harvey's book, but trust me when I say that the book does not need plugging since it made the best seller list (just wanted to get that off my chest). This is one of those films that I am going to have to watch again because the audience was laughing so loud and long that I fear I missed some of the jokes. That being said .. Kevin Hart (Cedric) is a fool (in a good way). He had me (and the rest of the audience) cracking up. His comic timing and expressions are priceless. The relationship between Dominic (Michael Ealy) and Lauren (Taraji P Henson) was probably the most honest (compared to the others). I like the reference that they made to For Colored Girls (classic). I have always considered Michael Ealy to be very sexy and he did not disappoint in this film (Yum). Michael (Terrance Jenkins) was a true mama's boy almost to the point of being sickening, but Candace (Regina Hall) did what she had to do to rectify that situation. The longtime relationship between Jeremy (Jerry Ferrara) and Kristen (Gabrielle Union) is one that a lot of couples will be able to relate to. Finally, Zeke (Romany Malco) . What can I say, there are a bunch of you out there and I am glad that Mya (Meagan Good) stuck to her guns. The only negative thing that I would say about the film is that I am not sure that Alex (Chris Brown) needed to keep popping in on the scenes. It was kind of redundant since the film already had a "playa". Wendy Williams (Gail) and Sherri Shephard (Vicki) had small roles in the film, but it was good to see the talk show hosts represent. I think that a lot of people may see this film as a "chick flick", but I like to think of it as a great date movie. I think that the implied war of the sexes will appeal to all and if nothing else, Kevin Hart will keep you in stitches. This film is well worth the price of a ticket. Put down the book and get out and see this film because this will be the one that they will be talking about next to the water cooler on Monday. I am giving this film a green light.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45842,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-07-11","keywords":"animated credits,four word title,african american,african american protagonist,interracial friendship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3746799129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2093097/","name":"Chris Brown","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1103162/","name":"Tim Story"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045552/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0146485/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226647/","name":"Keith Merryman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226970/","name":"David A. programme.title: Mardi Gras: Spring Break
Mardi Gras: Ostatki na ostro
Mardi Gras: Spring Break
programme.desc: Mardi Gras: Spring Break: Directed by Phil Dornfeld. With Nicholas D'Agosto, Josh Gad, Bret Harrison, Arielle Kebbel. A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1083462/","name":"Mardi Gras: Spring Break","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk5NTQ1MDI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzM5Njk4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1083462/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"derhonk01"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"8.1 - Are you kidding me??","reviewBody":"OK the only reason I write this review is because of the Rating here on this site. Normally I find the ratings on IMDb very reliable. Most of the time it is a good tool to differentiate good movies from crappy ones and the ratings correlate with my own taste in general. So i tend so sometimes watch movies which got a good rating on IMDb although they wouldn't appeal to me otherwise. And very often I had a pleasant surprise and found really good flicks that I wouldn't even have noticed otherwise. Not in this case. At the time I'm writing this the movie has a rating of 8.1 which is already very very good if you consider that classics like Gone with the wind or Good Will Hunting are rated equally high. So I decided to watch it solely because of the good rating and was extremely disappointed to have wasted about 90 minutes on this piece of garbage. It is a mediocre movie at the very best and I wouldn't even go that far. I have no idea how such a flick can get an 8.1. Maybe all the actors and their their entire families gave it a 10. I don't know and I don't care. My only motivation to deal with this movie a little longer than the 90 minutes it lasted is to prevent others from making the same mistake I did. So here is my review that says everything there is to say about this flick: THIS IS NOT A GOOD MOVIE. STORY AND ACTING ARE WAY BELOW AVERAGE. ITS NOT FUNNY OR VERY ENTERTAINING AND THE RATING OF 8.1 IS COMPLETELY UNDESERVED!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5852,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-09-23","keywords":"mardi gras,public nudity,sex tape,female nudity,bloopers during credits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"US Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3994000409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTE4MTk4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTAxMDE1Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTE4MTk4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTAxMDE1Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194900/","name":"Nicholas D'Agosto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1265802/","name":"Josh Gad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365501/","name":"Bret Harrison"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233917/","name":"Phil Dornfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097246/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0230335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118054/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372222/","name":"Josh Heald"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

Henson (role=Lauren), Terrence Jenkins (role=Michael), Jenifer Lewis (role=Loretta), Romany Malco (role=Zeke), Gary Owen (role=Bennett), Gabrielle Union (role=Kristen), La La Anthony (role=Sonia)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1621045, Title: Think Like a Man, --- Description: Think Like a Man: Directed by Tim Story. With Michael Ealy, Jerry Ferrara, Meagan Good, Regina Hall. Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1621045/","name":"Think Like a Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc4NDg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzNDAxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1621045/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cattjones","dateCreated":"2012-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Kevin Hart Show","reviewBody":"I am sure that a lot of folks will think that this is a film to plug Steve Harvey's book, but trust me when I say that the book does not need plugging since it made the best seller list (just wanted to get that off my chest). This is one of those films that I am going to have to watch again because the audience was laughing so loud and long that I fear I missed some of the jokes. That being said .. Kevin Hart (Cedric) is a fool (in a good way). He had me (and the rest of the audience) cracking up. His comic timing and expressions are priceless. The relationship between Dominic (Michael Ealy) and Lauren (Taraji P Henson) was probably the most honest (compared to the others). I like the reference that they made to For Colored Girls (classic). I have always considered Michael Ealy to be very sexy and he did not disappoint in this film (Yum). Michael (Terrance Jenkins) was a true mama's boy almost to the point of being sickening, but Candace (Regina Hall) did what she had to do to rectify that situation. The longtime relationship between Jeremy (Jerry Ferrara) and Kristen (Gabrielle Union) is one that a lot of couples will be able to relate to. Finally, Zeke (Romany Malco) . What can I say, there are a bunch of you out there and I am glad that Mya (Meagan Good) stuck to her guns. The only negative thing that I would say about the film is that I am not sure that Alex (Chris Brown) needed to keep popping in on the scenes. It was kind of redundant since the film already had a "playa". Wendy Williams (Gail) and Sherri Shephard (Vicki) had small roles in the film, but it was good to see the talk show hosts represent. I think that a lot of people may see this film as a "chick flick", but I like to think of it as a great date movie. I think that the implied war of the sexes will appeal to all and if nothing else, Kevin Hart will keep you in stitches. This film is well worth the price of a ticket. Put down the book and get out and see this film because this will be the one that they will be talking about next to the water cooler on Monday. A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1083462/","name":"Mardi Gras: Spring Break","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk5NTQ1MDI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzM5Njk4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1083462/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"derhonk01"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"8.1 - Are you kidding me??","reviewBody":"OK the only reason I write this review is because of the Rating here on this site. Normally I find the ratings on IMDb very reliable. Most of the time it is a good tool to differentiate good movies from crappy ones and the ratings correlate with my own taste in general. So i tend so sometimes watch movies which got a good rating on IMDb although they wouldn't appeal to me otherwise. And very often I had a pleasant surprise and found really good flicks that I wouldn't even have noticed otherwise. Not in this case. At the time I'm writing this the movie has a rating of 8.1 which is already very very good if you consider that classics like Gone with the wind or Good Will Hunting are rated equally high. So I decided to watch it solely because of the good rating and was extremely disappointed to have wasted about 90 minutes on this piece of garbage. It is a mediocre movie at the very best and I wouldn't even go that far. I have no idea how such a flick can get an 8.1. Maybe all the actors and their their entire families gave it a 10. I don't know and I don't care. My only motivation to deal with this movie a little longer than the 90 minutes it lasted is to prevent others from making the same mistake I did. So here is my review that says everything there is to say about this flick: THIS IS NOT A GOOD MOVIE. STORY AND ACTING ARE WAY BELOW AVERAGE. ITS NOT FUNNY OR VERY ENTERTAINING AND THE RATING OF 8.1 IS COMPLETELY UNDESERVED!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5852,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-09-23","keywords":"mardi gras,public nudity,sex tape,female nudity,bloopers during credits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"US Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3994000409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTE4MTk4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTAxMDE1Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOTE4MTk4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTAxMDE1Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194900/","name":"Nicholas D'Agosto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1265802/","name":"Josh Gad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365501/","name":"Bret Harrison"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233917/","name":"Phil Dornfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097246/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0230335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118054/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372222/","name":"Josh Heald"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Think Like a Man
Myśl jak facet
Think Like a Man
programme.desc: Think Like a Man: Directed by Tim Story. With Michael Ealy, Jerry Ferrara, Meagan Good, Regina Hall. Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1621045/","name":"Think Like a Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc4NDg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzNDAxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1621045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cattjones"},"dateCreated":"2012-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Kevin Hart Show","reviewBody":"I am sure that a lot of folks will think that this is a film to plug Steve Harvey's book, but trust me when I say that the book does not need plugging since it made the best seller list (just wanted to get that off my chest). This is one of those films that I am going to have to watch again because the audience was laughing so loud and long that I fear I missed some of the jokes. That being said .. Kevin Hart (Cedric) is a fool (in a good way). He had me (and the rest of the audience) cracking up. His comic timing and expressions are priceless. The relationship between Dominic (Michael Ealy) and Lauren (Taraji P Henson) was probably the most honest (compared to the others). I like the reference that they made to For Colored Girls (classic). I have always considered Michael Ealy to be very sexy and he did not disappoint in this film (Yum). Michael (Terrance Jenkins) was a true mama's boy almost to the point of being sickening, but Candace (Regina Hall) did what she had to do to rectify that situation. The longtime relationship between Jeremy (Jerry Ferrara) and Kristen (Gabrielle Union) is one that a lot of couples will be able to relate to. Finally, Zeke (Romany Malco) . What can I say, there are a bunch of you out there and I am glad that Mya (Meagan Good) stuck to her guns. The only negative thing that I would say about the film is that I am not sure that Alex (Chris Brown) needed to keep popping in on the scenes. It was kind of redundant since the film already had a "playa". Wendy Williams (Gail) and Sherri Shephard (Vicki) had small roles in the film, but it was good to see the talk show hosts represent. I think that a lot of people may see this film as a "chick flick", but I like to think of it as a great date movie. I think that the implied war of the sexes will appeal to all and if nothing else, Kevin Hart will keep you in stitches. This film is well worth the price of a ticket. Put down the book and get out and see this film because this will be the one that they will be talking about next to the water cooler on Monday. I am giving this film a green light.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45842,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-07-11","keywords":"animated credits,four word title,african american,african american protagonist,interracial friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3746799129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2093097/","name":"Chris Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1103162/","name":"Tim Story"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045552/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0146485/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226647/","name":"Keith Merryman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226970/","name":"David A. Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367724/","name":"Steve Harvey"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1621045, Title: Think Like a Man, --- Description: Think Like a Man: Directed by Tim Story. With Michael Ealy, Jerry Ferrara, Meagan Good, Regina Hall. Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1621045/","name":"Think Like a Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc4NDg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzNDAxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1621045/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cattjones","dateCreated":"2012-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Kevin Hart Show","reviewBody":"I am sure that a lot of folks will think that this is a film to plug Steve Harvey's book, but trust me when I say that the book does not need plugging since it made the best seller list (just wanted to get that off my chest). This is one of those films that I am going to have to watch again because the audience was laughing so loud and long that I fear I missed some of the jokes. That being said .. Kevin Hart (Cedric) is a fool (in a good way). He had me (and the rest of the audience) cracking up. His comic timing and expressions are priceless. The relationship between Dominic (Michael Ealy) and Lauren (Taraji P Henson) was probably the most honest (compared to the others). I like the reference that they made to For Colored Girls (classic). I have always considered Michael Ealy to be very sexy and he did not disappoint in this film (Yum). Michael (Terrance Jenkins) was a true mama's boy almost to the point of being sickening, but Candace (Regina Hall) did what she had to do to rectify that situation. The longtime relationship between Jeremy (Jerry Ferrara) and Kristen (Gabrielle Union) is one that a lot of couples will be able to relate to. Finally, Zeke (Romany Malco) . What can I say, there are a bunch of you out there and I am glad that Mya (Meagan Good) stuck to her guns. The only negative thing that I would say about the film is that I am not sure that Alex (Chris Brown) needed to keep popping in on the scenes. It was kind of redundant since the film already had a "playa". Wendy Williams (Gail) and Sherri Shephard (Vicki) had small roles in the film, but it was good to see the talk show hosts represent. I think that a lot of people may see this film as a "chick flick", but I like to think of it as a great date movie. I think that the implied war of the sexes will appeal to all and if nothing else, Kevin Hart will keep you in stitches. This film is well worth the price of a ticket. Put down the book and get out and see this film because this will be the one that they will be talking about next to the water cooler on Monday. I am giving this film a green light.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45842,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-07-11","keywords":"animated credits,four word title,african american,african american protagonist,interracial friendship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3746799129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2093097/","name":"Chris Brown","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1103162/","name":"Tim Story"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045552/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0146485/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226647/","name":"Keith Merryman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226970/","name":"David A. programme.title: Think Like a Man
Myśl jak facet
Think Like a Man
programme.desc: Think Like a Man: Directed by Tim Story. With Michael Ealy, Jerry Ferrara, Meagan Good, Regina Hall. Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1621045/","name":"Think Like a Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc4NDg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTMzNDAxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1621045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cattjones"},"dateCreated":"2012-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Kevin Hart Show","reviewBody":"I am sure that a lot of folks will think that this is a film to plug Steve Harvey's book, but trust me when I say that the book does not need plugging since it made the best seller list (just wanted to get that off my chest). This is one of those films that I am going to have to watch again because the audience was laughing so loud and long that I fear I missed some of the jokes. That being said .. Kevin Hart (Cedric) is a fool (in a good way). He had me (and the rest of the audience) cracking up. His comic timing and expressions are priceless. The relationship between Dominic (Michael Ealy) and Lauren (Taraji P Henson) was probably the most honest (compared to the others). I like the reference that they made to For Colored Girls (classic). I have always considered Michael Ealy to be very sexy and he did not disappoint in this film (Yum). Michael (Terrance Jenkins) was a true mama's boy almost to the point of being sickening, but Candace (Regina Hall) did what she had to do to rectify that situation. The longtime relationship between Jeremy (Jerry Ferrara) and Kristen (Gabrielle Union) is one that a lot of couples will be able to relate to. Finally, Zeke (Romany Malco) . What can I say, there are a bunch of you out there and I am glad that Mya (Meagan Good) stuck to her guns. The only negative thing that I would say about the film is that I am not sure that Alex (Chris Brown) needed to keep popping in on the scenes. It was kind of redundant since the film already had a "playa". Wendy Williams (Gail) and Sherri Shephard (Vicki) had small roles in the film, but it was good to see the talk show hosts represent. I think that a lot of people may see this film as a "chick flick", but I like to think of it as a great date movie. I think that the implied war of the sexes will appeal to all and if nothing else, Kevin Hart will keep you in stitches. This film is well worth the price of a ticket. Put down the book and get out and see this film because this will be the one that they will be talking about next to the water cooler on Monday. I am giving this film a green light.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45842,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-07-11","keywords":"animated credits,four word title,african american,african american protagonist,interracial friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3746799129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDAwNzIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk5MTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2093097/","name":"Chris Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1103162/","name":"Tim Story"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045552/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0146485/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226647/","name":"Keith Merryman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226970/","name":"David A. Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367724/","name":"Steve Harvey"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Palimpsest
Palimpsest
programme.desc: Palimpsest: Directed by Konrad Niewolski. With Andrzej Chyra, Magdalena Cielecka, Robert Gonera, Tomasz Sapryk. Marek, the main character of "Palimpsest," is a police inspector, a man on the verge of psychological disintegration trying to solve an intricate case. The story is told on two planes. The first one is a crime story, which constitutes the framework of the film. In the course of events, another theme appears - psychological experiences of the main character. Vivid blend of picture with sound and music will draw the audience into the deepest recesses of Marek's mind, making the viewers face questions: What is reality and what is only an illusion? Where is the borderline between the real world and our perception of it? What makes suffering meaningful and what is really important in one's life"?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805580/","name":"Palimpsest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNDg3Njg2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODk4NTk5Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Marek, the main character of "Palimpsest," is a police inspector, a man on the verge of psychological disintegration trying to solve an intricate case. The story is told on two planes. The first one is a crime story, which constitute","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805580/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"s-guyett"},"dateCreated":"2007-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kafkaesque thriller","reviewBody":"Yes, this film is derivative of Lynch. However, it is more cleanly executed than many of Lynch's films, and has a distinctly European, Kafkaesque feel to it. \n\nApart from some shaky acting at times (although the lead is excellent, some of the support is heavy handed), this is better thought through than many films that simply try to create an atmosphere with no plot. The direction is perfect, and best of all, the film does not just dissolve into a set of unsolved riddles. Should be appreciated by anyone who enjoys deeper, psychological, or art-house, thrillers. I found this a very good follow up to "Symmetry".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":505,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-08-18","keywords":"police inspector,murder,husband wife relationship,doctor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161607/","name":"Andrzej Chyra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0162123/","name":"Magdalena Cielecka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327290/","name":"Robert Gonera"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1407454/","name":"Konrad Niewolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067099/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107013/","name":"Igor Brejdygant"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We Need Lungs
We Need Lungs: Running the Pyrenees
programme.desc: We Need Lungs: Directed by Ludovico de Maistre. 900 kms of running in 9 days across the Pyrenees and over 60.000 meters of ascent and descent from the Atlantic to the Mediterranean. programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
Miłość, ślub i inne nieszczęścia
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
programme.desc:
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Maggie Grace, Jeremy Irons, Diane Keaton, Diego Boneta. It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10235718/","name":"Love, Weddings & Other Disasters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA5NzRjMDktMzc0My00NDdkLThlN2YtNDZiYjM3MGVkY2M4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10235718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ts-0000"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why the hate?","reviewBody":"Was it perfect? Lol-Not at all.

However did have overall parts,that made it watchable.

Casting was decent,most of the storylines & cinematography too."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1643,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"couple","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4041982233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maggie Grace (Taken) and Oscar® winners Diane Keaton and Jeremy Irons lead this warmhearted romantic comedy. With a couple’s impending wedding as the backdrop, Love, Weddings & Other Disasters weaves multiple storylines as it follows the search for love by a colorful group of characters including: an inexperienced wedding planner (Grace) nicknamed “The Wedding Trasher”; a fussy celebrity caterer (Irons); his blind date (Keaton); and a tour-bus guide (Andrew Bachelor) looking for his Cinderella. How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Horizon Line
Po horyzont
Horizon Line
programme.desc: Horizon Line: Directed by Mikael Marcimain. With Allison Williams, Alexander Dreymon, Keith David, Pearl Mackie. A couple flying on a small plane to attend a tropical island wedding must fight for their lives after their pilot suffers a heart attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5498354/","name":"Horizon Line","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE1YjYwZmItYWEzMS00MGM3LTlhYTQtOWIyM2Y1MmUzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple flying on a small plane to attend a tropical island wedding must fight for their lives after their pilot suffers a heart attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5498354/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mcsinteriors"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not that bad at all...it's for entertainment!","reviewBody":"Does the movie have some silly parts, yes, but it entertained me for the full 1:30. Not every movie has to be an Oscar contender. Sometimes movies are just meant to be fun, silly, and take you to another place for 90 minutes. programme.title: Piłka nożna: Liga angielska - mecz: Liverpool FC - Aston Villa FC
programme.desc: Mara (Sarah Hyland) ma 27 lat. Pewnego dnia przychodzi jej na myśl, by przez internet umówić się na randkę w ciemno z nieznajomym mężczyzną. W ten sposób poznaje Jake'a (Tyler James Williams), który wzbudza jej duże zainteresowanie. Szybko się do siebie zbliżają, a Mara przestaje odczuwać lęk na myśl o zobowiązaniach.

programme.title: One of a Kind Love
Jedyna taka miłość
One of a Kind Love
programme.desc: One of a Kind Love: Directed by Philippe Lupien. With Jocelyn Hudon, Jake Manley, Daniela Sandiford, Raphael Grosz-Harvey. Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. When a vacant shop becomes available in town, Kyra sees an opportunity to put a plan into action, until she learns that there's another renter interested in the space. Enter Aiden Sawyer, prodigal son, big-city business magnate and Kyra's childhood nemesis, returning home to the country club his parents own. As they patch up their past, Kyra and Aiden learn that there may be something more between them than just playful flirting. But when Kyra enters a renowned jewelry contest to raise enough money to outbid the mystery renter, Aiden finds himself in a race against time to make everything right." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13012364/","name":"One of a Kind Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGY4MWQwNTEtOTEzMC00NDdjLWIwMTItMzcyZDhiMWNiM2JmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. When a vacant shop becomes available in town, Kyra sees an opportunity to put a plan into action, unti","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13012364/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sheldonlinda"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Formula but sweet","reviewBody":"This film follows the typical Hallmark formula - uptight girl with high finance job returns to her small town from the big city and falls in love with boy she grew up with who has a folksy job. In this case it is the boy who returns to the small town, but the girl is still uptight - only mildly, and it is her that has the folksy job. Horrendously predictable with the the expected conflict, but the conflict happened later on and wasn't nearly as bad as expected. In a way I liked having a film that just followed a relationship without too much conflict. It gave a sense of realism to how relationships usually progress. Watch this on it is sweet. The trivia says that the two leads at the time were engaged and you can see the realism in their chemistry which was nice - and also without the wince knowing one or both of the actors are married to someone else in real life. (Maybe I am weird, but I did do that while watching a different rom com last night.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":186,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2021-04-28","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"One of a Kind Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1855701017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRiMjYxYWItNzdmNy00YTk3LWIyYjktYjg3ZDNiMTk2YWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRiMjYxYWItNzdmNy00YTk3LWIyYjktYjg3ZDNiMTk2YWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance/Comedy TV Movie\nStarring Jocelyne Hudon"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6749397/","name":"Jocelyn Hudon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4889489/","name":"Jake Manley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8544044/","name":"Daniela Sandiford"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3560439/","name":"Philippe Lupien"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0228741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1672013/","name":"Barbara Kymlicka"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Breaking News in Yuba County
Skandal w hrabstwie Yuba
Breaking News In Yuba County
programme.desc:
Breaking News in Yuba County: Directed by Tate Taylor. With Allison Janney, Mila Kunis, Regina Hall, Awkwafina. A woman takes advantage of her growing celebrity status when the police and the public think her dead husband is just missing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7737640/","name":"Breaking News in Yuba County","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJkMTg1NWUtN2E0Yy00Y2M4LWEyMjItMjQ4ZDBiYmY3ZWIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman takes advantage of her growing celebrity status when the police and the public think her dead husband is just missing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7737640/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stklaus"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"I'm not sure why critics hate this one","reviewBody":"This is a light black slapstick comedy, which runs low-key, nothing spectacular, but is never boring. The humour and the film is driven by its entangled plot, for once it doesn't comprise laugh-out-loud, gross (there is some violence) or forced jokes, no, it's the satiric story that is fun and entertaining.

Since lots of people are involved, I give you some story infos for an easier watch (which won't spoil anything):

Her (A.Janney) husband Karl (M. Modine), a banker, was involved in money laundering and now ows money to the bad guys. Her brother Pete (J. Simpson) seemed to do some robbery and is also involved with the bad guys coincidentally. Her sister (Mila Kunis) works for a small TV station.

programme.title: Unhinged
Nieobliczalny
Unhinged
programme.desc: Unhinged: Directed by Derrick Borte. With Russell Crowe, Caren Pistorius, Gabriel Bateman, Jimmi Simpson. After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10059518/","name":"Unhinged","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc1Mjg5NjItY2I2MS00NDk3LWI5NGYtNzZjNTNiZmMwZTA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10059518/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Impartial-Reviewer"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Many People, Few Manners.","reviewBody":"An unstable man under a lot of life stress confront a woman who's having a bad life and a bad day at an intersection. In it what can be cured with a simple apology, yet out of arrogance escalates into a hellish nightmare as the woman's whole life becomes a target of the man's rage. Out of technicality, the plot is quite simple with few logical gaps. with that in mind and aside from the ridiculously bad choices which the female lead makes across the whole movie not to mention her passive boring personality...Yet with a raw chilling performance from Russell Crowe who owned the aggression and hate of his role, he single handedly managed to elevate the movie to a notable level of thrills, entertainment and excitement. The director succeeds in painting some interesting surprises in the car chase scenes and an over all thrilling experience that is worth watching.\n\nUnlike some views, I experienced this movie from a different point of view, to me the whole idea revolves around the concept of decency and common courtesy among mankind that most of us lost, maybe the fake bubble of freedom and personal rights that we live our daily lives in or how awfully some were raised on a fake racist patriotism which believes that a certain nationality/race is above others or or or. All are false reasons to be rude, mistreat others or lose compassion and courtesy for one another. Either you watch Unhinged for the thrilling entertainment or for the eye opening message the results is quite satisfying on both ends."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":59311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-07-31","keywords":"stabbed in the eye with scissors,driving,road rage,psychopath,stalking","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3319512601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA2MWY5ZGQtNmZkNS00NzFiLTlhNTYtMWJmMzA2ZDVlNDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA2MWY5ZGQtNmZkNS00NzFiLTlhNTYtMWJmMzA2ZDVlNDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award winner Russell Crowe stars in a timely psychological thriller that explores the fragile balance of a society pushed to the edge, taking something we’ve all experienced — road rage — to an unpredictable and terrifying conclusion."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3308569/","name":"Caren Pistorius"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5145655/","name":"Gabriel Bateman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097517/","name":"Derrick Borte"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784470/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0531993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0716530/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0255296/","name":"Carl Ellsworth"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Bayala: A Magical Adventure: Directed by Aina Järvine, Federico Milella. With Madison Mullahey, Jessica Webb, Sara Petersen, Marc Thompson. Fantasy country of Bayala is on danger. Only twin sisters Surah and Sera can save it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7063304/","name":"Bayala: A Magical Adventure","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGMxMjZmMGMtNDhkZC00OGRjLWJkOWMtY2VjN2MwOGM3ZmE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg1NDcyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fantasy country of Bayala is on danger. Only twin sisters Surah and Sera can save it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7063304/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Ashley9965-1"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyed the movie but shouldn't it be the fairy princess and the dragon?","reviewBody":"My daughter is big into unicorns. There really isn't much out there that focus on unicorns so obviously I watched this based on the title. I even watched a snippet of the trailer and figured they were just saving the unicorns for the movie. So I figured we'd give it a chance because she also loves fairies. My kids all enjoyed the movie and I did as well. But are you kidding me with the title? Very very misleading. There are two 5 second scenes thag just show the unicorn. The unicorn has absolutely nothing to do with this movie. I loved the dragons. But maybe they figured little girls would be less likely to watch if it was dragons in the title instead of unicorns? I enjoyed the movie but it really irked me how misleading the title was.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"genre":["Animation","Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2019-10-24","keywords":"fairy,fairy queen,rainbow,fairy tale,forest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2103688729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUxMmNkM2UtZDdjNy00ZmRiLTgzYmMtZmM2YTcxOGJkMDM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUxMmNkM2UtZDdjNy00ZmRiLTgzYmMtZmM2YTcxOGJkMDM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10813946/","name":"Madison Mullahey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10813947/","name":"Jessica Webb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10813949/","name":"Sara Petersen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2853644/","name":"Aina Järvine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5520869/","name":"Federico Milella"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0460620/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0277645/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006290/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0382655/","name":"Pamela Hickey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8549650/","name":"Jeffrey Hylton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0382614/","name":"Dennys McCoy"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nieznany Madagaskar
programme.desc: Niepowtarzalna przyroda Madagaskaru znajduje się w niebezpieczeństwie. Wyspa, która leży na Oceanie Indyjskim, przy wschodnim wybrzeżu Afryki, fascynuje nie tylko bogactwem flory, ale też niezwykłymi endemicznymi gatunkami zwierząt. Niestety, okazuje się, że nie ma ona nic wspólnego z rajem. Autorzy dwuczęściowego dokumentu pokazują, jak szybko człowiek ze swoją gospodarką doprowadza do zniszczenia tamtejszej przyrody, m.in. sporych połaci lasów deszczowych.

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
Fit for a Prince
programme.desc:
Fit for a Prince: Directed by Marita Grabiak. With Jonathan Keltz, Natalie Hall, Melinda Michael, Tanya Clarke. A fashion designer is hired to dress ladies of a wealthy family which are hosting an upcoming charity ball. Cindy's life takes an unexpected turn when Prince Ronan becomes smitten with her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt14039028/","name":"Fit for a Prince","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGRmYjFiOTQtOWY3MS00OTdlLTk4ZmItMzY0MjdhMTczZjQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjAwNzczNTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fashion designer is hired to dress ladies of a wealthy family which are hosting an upcoming charity ball. Cindy's life takes an unexpected turn when Prince Ronan becomes smitten with her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14039028/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cgvsluis"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"If I can restore things with my hands I am sure I can be of some help.","reviewBody":"Natalie Hall who plays Cindy is delightful! But what I truly enjoyed about this film is how the prince sees through the facade and figures out very quickly who the real designer is behind Rebecca Roslyn's designs. Not only does he obtain this information quickly, but he is not easily fooled in to thinking otherwise...and he is incredible supportive of someone who he views as an incredibly talented, hard working, under appreciated designer.

When his group of friends intentionally trick Cindy in to underdressing for an event, the prince goes out of his way to try to make her feel comfortable by also dressing down. This isn't the only way he tries to build her up and make her feel comfortable...at one point in spite not being able to sew, he helps Cindy remake dresses for the ball under an extreme time crunch. He is really beyond too impossible to be true! But that is why we watch Hallmark, isn't it? Therefore Prince Ronan is perfect, as ordered!

I appreciated how the romantic rival, after initially doing something mean spirited, turns a new leaf and champions her rival before the last five minutes of the film where they usually cede there defeat. I also really appreciated the actress who was the grandmother (I think) who was real and honest...and telling like it was from the onset.

"Spontaneous, in the moment, out of character."

As mentioned, Natalie Hall is delightful and you should watch this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":688,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2021-03-06","keywords":"pennsylvania,fashion designer,seamstress,prince,eligible bachelor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1947831/","name":"Jonathan Keltz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2834250/","name":"Natalie Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5711531/","name":"Melinda Michael"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333239/","name":"Marita Grabiak"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197380/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12070716/","name":"T. Booker James"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Radioactive: Directed by Marjane Satrapi. With Rosamund Pike, Yvette Feuer, Mirjam Novak, Ralph Berkin. The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6017756/","name":"Radioactive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkNzY3MmUtYjJlNC00NTM0LWFiNmYtZDA4NzBiMmU1MzI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE0OTU5Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6017756/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Snootz"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Poorly written, badly directed and underwhelming","reviewBody":"The most accurate thing I can say about this movie is that I watched it... then went searching for the real story. This excessive dramatization I am sure does little to present the true story.

Unlike many here I did not mind the reference to Hiroshima and Chernobyl. Although these happened long after Curie died and had no effect on her career, they were reminders of an important fact: science can be used in a beneficial manner, or in a questionable and disastrous manner. These things had nothing to do with Curie herself, but were cautionary references that I found pertinent to the concept that discovery always bears consequence.

As for Curie herself, at the end of this flick I felt I knew no more about her than when I started watching. The story dramatizes her personal life and excessively focuses on personal relationships while leaving out far too much of her science and actual career accomplishments. That is certainly no credit to the production and earns it a "mediocre" 5 stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-06-15","keywords":"scientist,physicist,science,physics,chemistry","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1577631257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxMzMxYWQtZjM5Mi00ZGYzLTgyNzUtZWFjNDQ5NTliYjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxMzMxYWQtZjM5Mi00ZGYzLTgyNzUtZWFjNDQ5NTliYjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"A story of the scientific and romantic passions of Marie Sklodowska-Curie (Polish scientist) and Pierre Curie, and the reverberation of their discoveries throughout the 20th century."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275431/","name":"Yvette Feuer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597296/","name":"Mirjam Novak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2277869/","name":"Marjane Satrapi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113666/","name":"Jack Thorne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9706688/","name":"Lauren Redniss"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="
