Qu'un sang impur...
programme.desc:
Qu'un sang impur...: Directed by Abdel Raouf Dafri. With Johan Heldenbergh, Linh-Dan Pham, Lyna Khoudri, Steve Tientcheu. While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a real powder keg in the hands of the rebels." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9348690/","name":"Qu'un sang impur...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJhMTI0YWYtMzVjYi00ZjRiLTk1MTAtY2U5ZTRlYjA0NTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIwMzA0NTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a re","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9348690/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"saurabhyadav13"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Film. Historical and Gripping","reviewBody":"I think this movie is easily one of all-time Top 10 War films, and I'm not French or Algerian.

Nothing is predictable or black and white here, so realistic and gritty, the locations and actors are very authentic.

The characters pull you into their lives and the dialogue shines through even as subtitles. There are no winners in a war and the films shows it very well, makes you want to find out more about what happened in Algeria in 1960.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":324,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2020-01-22","keywords":"french algerian war,algerian war,sniper,torture,renegade commander","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce Teaser [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3241525017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBiZDBiMWUtZDhjMS00ZTA5LWFjOWItMTQyYzMwYmM4NTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBiZDBiMWUtZDhjMS00ZTA5LWFjOWItMTQyYzMwYmM4NTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0374949/","name":"Johan Heldenbergh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0199006/","name":"Linh-Dan Pham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6891947/","name":"Lyna Khoudri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593456/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0729612/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Lies
Prawdziwe kłamstwa
True Lies
programme.desc: True Lies: Directed by James Cameron. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Bill Paxton. A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111503/","name":"True Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg5YmUyNGMtMThiNS00MjA2LTgwZDctNDlhM2RkZDNmZmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United Stat","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ryan_kuhn"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":""Can you hurry up. My horse is getting tired."","reviewBody":"James Cameron has directed some fantastic action movies during his career (Aliens, the first two Terminator movies, The Abyss, Titanic--that boat action was like totally awesome!!), but none were as funny as True Lies is. Arnold Schwarzenegger (Terminator, Eraser, the Governor of California) is Harry Tasker, a computer programming father by day, James Bond by night, working for a top secret government agency that is beyond the CIA and run by Charlton Heston. Tom Arnold, in his first dramatic role, plays Harry's partner, Gib, and is the smartass, class clown of the agency. Schwarzenegger and Arnold have a fantastic chemistry, creating the movie's biggest laughs. Jamie Lee Curtis plays Harry's under-appreciated wife, Helen, who flirts with the idea of leaving Harry for a used-car salesman, played with uber-confidence by Bill Paxson. Helen finds out the true identity of her husband in another funny scene where both are captured by Arab terrorists with help from a truth serum. The action part of True Lies comes from Harry trying to track down the nuclear bomb that has been stolen by the terrorists. A wonderfully shot escape scene on the bridge that connects the Florida Keys to the mainland is the pinnacle of True Lies. An action film that does not take itself too seriously (notice all of the silly Arnold-lines peppered throughout the movie, my personal favorite being "you're fired!" before Trump thought of it), True Lies is wildly entertaining, so much so that you almost forget Tom Arnold was married to Roseanne.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1994-07-15","keywords":"secret agent,spy,secret mission,remake,tango","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"True Lies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi284754201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956022/","name":"Claude Zidi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584770/","name":"Simon Michaël"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436687/","name":"Didier Kaminka"}],"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Spongebob: Na suchym lądzie
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc:
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water: Directed by Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell. With Antonio Banderas, Eric Bauza, Tim Conway, Eddie Deezen. When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2279373/","name":"The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYyNDczNTE0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkzNDYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2279373/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Drive-in_Zeppelin"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nautical Nonsense takes on a whole new dimension (literally)","reviewBody":"Seriously though, unless you have been living under a rock like Patrick the starfish for the last few decades, you should at least have formed an opinion about the Spongebob series. It has a talking sponge that lives in a pineapple, flips burgers, and goes on nonsensical adventures with his slow-witted friend and neighbor. You either find it whimsical and funny or you don't. 

This holds true for the second feature film Sponge Out of Water as we find our beloved residents of Bikini Bottom forced to enter our three dimensional world for the first time. After a flamboyant pirate (Antonio Banderas) manages to steal the much sought after secret Krabby Patty recipe using a magic book, Spongebob and co. have their world plunged into anarchy with the sudden loss of the greasy burgers.

As expected (if you watched the show as a kid), our heroes have to go on a series of misadventures to recover the secret recipe and stop the mischievous pirate after he commits industrial theft. 

The thing your probably not expecting (if you've seen the trailer), is only a very small portion of this short film is actually 3D. It's not glaringly awful, and actually seems to work fairly well in a movie about abstract craziness that features time-traveling dolphins.

It's fun, plain and simple. The children in the audience we're giggling with delight, the adults found humor enough to laugh, and all in all I appreciated the blatant references to movies like Mad Max, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Shining. It's a movie that is directed at children, but is enriched with plenty of adult humor in the form of puns and famous movies references. 

Just enjoy it for what it is and you won't be disappointed. The animation is surreal and enjoyable as always, the voice-acting is tried and true, and everyone in the theater seemed to enjoy it thoroughly. 

Mild drug use is recommended for optimal viewing and humor extraction. 

Read the full review and others like it on the Drive-In Zeppelin website.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-30","keywords":"dinosaur,formula,plankton,secret formula,bubble","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi421768985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After spending his entire life under the sea in the Bikini Bottom Gulch, Spongebob, Patrick and the rest of their friends go on a quest to find the stolen recipe for their Krabby Patty burgers, which brings them into our world, where they encounter a nefarious pirate named Burger-Beard.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444786/","name":"Tom Kenny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265067/","name":"Bill Fagerbakke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196684/","name":"Paul Tibbitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020957/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008743/","name":"Jonathan Aibel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074184/","name":"Glenn Berger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384864/","name":"Stephen Hillenburg"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2279373, Title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water, --- Description: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water: Directed by Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell. With Antonio Banderas, Eric Bauza, Tim Conway, Eddie Deezen. When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2279373/","name":"The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYyNDczNTE0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkzNDYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2279373/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Drive-in_Zeppelin","dateCreated":"2015-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nautical Nonsense takes on a whole new dimension (literally)","reviewBody":"Seriously though, unless you have been living under a rock like Patrick the starfish for the last few decades, you should at least have formed an opinion about the Spongebob series. It has a talking sponge that lives in a pineapple, flips burgers, and goes on nonsensical adventures with his slow-witted friend and neighbor. You either find it whimsical and funny or you don't. 

This holds true for the second feature film Sponge Out of Water as we find our beloved residents of Bikini Bottom forced to enter our three dimensional world for the first time. After a flamboyant pirate (Antonio Banderas) manages to steal the much sought after secret Krabby Patty recipe using a magic book, Spongebob and co. have their world plunged into anarchy with the sudden loss of the greasy burgers.

As expected (if you watched the show as a kid), our heroes have to go on a series of misadventures to recover the secret recipe and stop the mischievous pirate after he commits industrial theft. 

The thing your probably not expecting (if you've seen the trailer), is only a very small portion of this short film is actually 3D. It's not glaringly awful, and actually seems to work fairly well in a movie about abstract craziness that features time-traveling dolphins.

It's fun, plain and simple. The children in the audience we're giggling with delight, the adults found humor enough to laugh, and all in all I appreciated the blatant references to movies like Mad Max, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Shining. It's a movie that is directed at children, but is enriched with plenty of adult humor in the form of puns and famous movies references. 

Just enjoy it for what it is and you won't be disappointed. The animation is surreal and enjoyable as always, the voice-acting is tried and true, and everyone in the theater seemed to enjoy it thoroughly. 

Mild drug use is recommended for optimal viewing and humor extraction. 

Read the full review and others like it on the Drive-In Zeppelin website.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-30","keywords":"dinosaur,formula,plankton,secret formula,bubble","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi421768985","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After spending his entire life under the sea in the Bikini Bottom Gulch, Spongebob, Patrick and the rest of their friends go on a quest to find the stolen recipe for their Krabby Patty burgers, which brings them into our world, where they encounter a nefarious pirate named Burger-Beard.
","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444786/","name":"Tom Kenny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265067/","name":"Bill Fagerbakke"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196684/","name":"Paul Tibbitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390995/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020957/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008743/","name":"Jonathan Aibel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074184/","name":"Glenn Berger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384864/","name":"Stephen Hillenburg"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
Ciemny kryształ
The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: The Dark Crystal: Directed by Jim Henson, Frank Oz. With Jim Henson, Kathryn Mullen, Frank Oz, Dave Goelz. On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083791/","name":"The Dark Crystal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2MmJiZmQtZjBmMS00MTk4LWFmOWYtZGQzOTY5ODNjYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083791/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"winstonsmith_84"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Dream","reviewBody":"This movie is like an odd, but wonderful dream. It takes place in a fantasy world, created by the talented duo, Frank Oz and Jim Henson. Everything in this film is so meticulously done, that it still lives on to this day. Computer effects be damned. This film has texture, and it is pleasing to watch. This movie, as you will see, was made for kids. But really, it is a masterpiece in film-making. True, good, story-telling. Sure, kids will love it, but the film isn't really aimed at them like most kid movies are. It is complicated, eerie, beautiful, and intelligent... most of all, mystical. I reccomend this to anyone seriously interested in film, especially fantasy... not to be missed!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1982-12-17","keywords":"puppetry,magical crystal,crystal shard,cult favorite,puppet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629389593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rediscover the age of wonder inspired by Jim Henson's groundbreaking vision. programme.title: Jojo Rabbit
Jojo Rabbit
programme.desc:
Jojo Rabbit: Directed by Taika Waititi. With Roman Griffin Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, Scarlett Johansson, Taika Waititi. A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2584384/","name":"Jojo Rabbit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU0Yzk2MzEtMjAzYy00MzY0LTg2YmItM2RkNzdkY2ZhN2JkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg4NjY5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2584384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EvilMissQB"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moving, hilarious...tragic","reviewBody":"The trailer for the movie had me scratching my head but as a HUGE fan of Waititi I felt I ought to give it a shot.

My best spoiler free review is that this is an original, outrageous film. The emotional gamut we are subjected to is whiplash inducing, but without the neck brace and ambulance chasing lawyers.

Every actor is perfection. Young JoJo and Yorkie are devastatingly earnest and so talented. Sam Rockwell is always a master. Every subtle satire is underwritten with a grim level of truth. The soundtrack n unexpected choice.

Go see it. Prepare yourself for quite a ride.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":346196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2019-10-24","keywords":"nazi germany,world war two,satire,mother son relationship,black comedy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2663366425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIzMWMzMTgtZjNmOC00ZTMyLWJkZDItZWUxNGQ0OWNhMzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIzMWMzMTgtZjNmOC00ZTMyLWJkZDItZWUxNGQ0OWNhMzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Writer director Taika Waititi (THOR: RAGNAROK, HUNT FOR THE WILDERPEOPLE), brings his signature style of humor and pathos to his latest film, JOJO RABBIT, a World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy (Roman Griffin Davis as JoJo) whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother (Scarlett Johansson) is hiding a young Jewish girl (Thomasin McKenzie) in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler (Taika Waititi), Jojo must confront his blind nationalism."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9877392/","name":"Roman Griffin Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5057169/","name":"Thomasin McKenzie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537672/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118715/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9862836/","name":"Christine Leunens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Lies
Prawdziwe kłamstwa
True Lies
programme.desc: True Lies: Directed by James Cameron. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Bill Paxton. A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111503/","name":"True Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg5YmUyNGMtMThiNS00MjA2LTgwZDctNDlhM2RkZDNmZmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United Stat","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ryan_kuhn"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":""Can you hurry up. My horse is getting tired."","reviewBody":"James Cameron has directed some fantastic action movies during his career (Aliens, the first two Terminator movies, The Abyss, Titanic--that boat action was like totally awesome!!), but none were as funny as True Lies is. Arnold Schwarzenegger (Terminator, Eraser, the Governor of California) is Harry Tasker, a computer programming father by day, James Bond by night, working for a top secret government agency that is beyond the CIA and run by Charlton Heston. Tom Arnold, in his first dramatic role, plays Harry's partner, Gib, and is the smartass, class clown of the agency. Schwarzenegger and Arnold have a fantastic chemistry, creating the movie's biggest laughs. Jamie Lee Curtis plays Harry's under-appreciated wife, Helen, who flirts with the idea of leaving Harry for a used-car salesman, played with uber-confidence by Bill Paxson. Helen finds out the true identity of her husband in another funny scene where both are captured by Arab terrorists with help from a truth serum. The action part of True Lies comes from Harry trying to track down the nuclear bomb that has been stolen by the terrorists. A wonderfully shot escape scene on the bridge that connects the Florida Keys to the mainland is the pinnacle of True Lies. An action film that does not take itself too seriously (notice all of the silly Arnold-lines peppered throughout the movie, my personal favorite being "you're fired!" before Trump thought of it), True Lies is wildly entertaining, so much so that you almost forget Tom Arnold was married to Roseanne.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1994-07-15","keywords":"secret agent,spy,secret mission,remake,tango","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"True Lies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi284754201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956022/","name":"Claude Zidi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584770/","name":"Simon Michaël"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436687/","name":"Didier Kaminka"}],"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Spongebob: Na suchym lądzie
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc:
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water: Directed by Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell. With Antonio Banderas, Eric Bauza, Tim Conway, Eddie Deezen. When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2279373/","name":"The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYyNDczNTE0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkzNDYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2279373/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Drive-in_Zeppelin"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nautical Nonsense takes on a whole new dimension (literally)","reviewBody":"Seriously though, unless you have been living under a rock like Patrick the starfish for the last few decades, you should at least have formed an opinion about the Spongebob series. It has a talking sponge that lives in a pineapple, flips burgers, and goes on nonsensical adventures with his slow-witted friend and neighbor. You either find it whimsical and funny or you don't. 

This holds true for the second feature film Sponge Out of Water as we find our beloved residents of Bikini Bottom forced to enter our three dimensional world for the first time. After a flamboyant pirate (Antonio Banderas) manages to steal the much sought after secret Krabby Patty recipe using a magic book, Spongebob and co. have their world plunged into anarchy with the sudden loss of the greasy burgers.

As expected (if you watched the show as a kid), our heroes have to go on a series of misadventures to recover the secret recipe and stop the mischievous pirate after he commits industrial theft. 

The thing your probably not expecting (if you've seen the trailer), is only a very small portion of this short film is actually 3D. It's not glaringly awful, and actually seems to work fairly well in a movie about abstract craziness that features time-traveling dolphins.

It's fun, plain and simple. The children in the audience we're giggling with delight, the adults found humor enough to laugh, and all in all I appreciated the blatant references to movies like Mad Max, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Shining. It's a movie that is directed at children, but is enriched with plenty of adult humor in the form of puns and famous movies references. 

Just enjoy it for what it is and you won't be disappointed. The animation is surreal and enjoyable as always, the voice-acting is tried and true, and everyone in the theater seemed to enjoy it thoroughly. 

Mild drug use is recommended for optimal viewing and humor extraction. 

Read the full review and others like it on the Drive-In Zeppelin website.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-30","keywords":"dinosaur,formula,plankton,secret formula,bubble","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi421768985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After spending his entire life under the sea in the Bikini Bottom Gulch, Spongebob, Patrick and the rest of their friends go on a quest to find the stolen recipe for their Krabby Patty burgers, which brings them into our world, where they encounter a nefarious pirate named Burger-Beard.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444786/","name":"Tom Kenny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265067/","name":"Bill Fagerbakke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196684/","name":"Paul Tibbitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020957/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008743/","name":"Jonathan Aibel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074184/","name":"Glenn Berger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384864/","name":"Stephen Hillenburg"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

The thing your probably not expecting (if you've seen the trailer), is only a very small portion of this short film is actually 3D. It's not glaringly awful, and actually seems to work fairly well in a movie about abstract craziness that features time-traveling dolphins.

It's fun, plain and simple. The children in the audience we're giggling with delight, the adults found humor enough to laugh, and all in all I appreciated the blatant references to movies like Mad Max, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Shining. It's a movie that is directed at children, but is enriched with plenty of adult humor in the form of puns and famous movies references. 

Just enjoy it for what it is and you won't be disappointed. The animation is surreal and enjoyable as always, the voice-acting is tried and true, and everyone in the theater seemed to enjoy it thoroughly. 

Mild drug use is recommended for optimal viewing and humor extraction. 

Read the full review and others like it on the Drive-In Zeppelin website.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-30","keywords":"dinosaur,formula,plankton,secret formula,bubble","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi421768985","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After spending his entire life under the sea in the Bikini Bottom Gulch, Spongebob, Patrick and the rest of their friends go on a quest to find the stolen recipe for their Krabby Patty burgers, which brings them into our world, where they encounter a nefarious pirate named Burger-Beard.

programme.title: Favolacce
Złe baśnie
Favolacce
programme.desc: Favolacce: Directed by Damiano D'Innocenzo, Fabio D'Innocenzo. With Elio Germano, Tommaso Di Cola, Giulietta Rebeggiani, Gabriel Montesi. A few families living out on a limb in the suburbs of Rome. Tensions here can explode at any time; ultimately it's the children who bring about the collapse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8526370/","name":"Favolacce","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDhmMWE4MjktMGVlNi00ZWU3LWI3MTktZjk5ODkzY2M2NWFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTQwMDA5NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A few families living out on a limb in the suburbs of Rome. Tensions here can explode at any time; ultimately it's the children who bring about the collapse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8526370/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kiddo_bear"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"An extraordinary look at ordinary lives","reviewBody":"My personal favorite of the 2020 Berlin International Film Festival and winner of the Berlinale Bear for best script. The film introduces itself as: A true story inspired by a false story. The false story is not very inspired. Sounds mysterious? It better be, for this is a film enjoyed more the less you know. Okay, I'll give you this much: a dark look at life in the subjrbs outside Rome, where people's aspiration clash with reality. The story of a summer broken down into a sequence of immersive scenes, each containing its own drama and driven by an atmosphere of suspense. All is mostly viewed through the eyes of the kids. Highly recommended! On a side note: this is the second film of the D'Innocenzo Brothers that I've seen, and it is astonishing to observe how much they've matured as film makers and story tellers. Their first film - La Terra de'l abbastanza - had all the pieces but lacked a forceful plot to tie them together. Favolacce deliverd this force, in a unique way.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6911,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-06-15","keywords":"unhappy family,disfunctional family,rome italy,disturbing,malaise","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1897774617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZjQxODYtZjllYi00ZTU4LWEyZTctN2Q5YWYwZDljNjA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZjQxODYtZjllYi00ZTU4LWEyZTctN2Q5YWYwZDljNjA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314554/","name":"Elio Germano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10971622/","name":"Tommaso Di Cola"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8584079/","name":"Giulietta Rebeggiani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4462605/","name":"Damiano D'Innocenzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4461870/","name":"Fabio D'Innocenzo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0380415/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280251/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4462605/","name":"Damiano D'Innocenzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4461870/","name":"Fabio D'Innocenzo"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
Zwierzęta nocy
Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc:
Nocturnal Animals: Directed by Tom Ford. With Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael Shannon, Aaron Taylor-Johnson. A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4550098/","name":"Nocturnal Animals","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwMzMwMzgxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0MTUzMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4550098/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"slimecity-38663"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thats great acting Gary!","reviewBody":"On a bit of a Jake binge, that led me here. You also cant go wrong with Amy Adams. Plus Jenna Malone if you are a fan of the amazing Neon Demon.

The story revolves around a novel containing a fairly OTT crime, but one that leaves room for visually compelling scene-setups. I like how the novel unfolds over several years, and ties in with the regrets over the decisions that the Amy Adams character made over her life. The analogies between her loveless, vacuous and empty life and the novel are pretty apparent.

This is a very compelling film with a very haunting ending. Well worth a watch. Its pretty tough viewing at times though","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256400,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-12-09","keywords":"revenge,loss of wife,art gallery,female frontal nudity,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326443545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzNzExODM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ3MDMwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzNzExODM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ3MDMwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a veiled threat and a symbolic revenge tale."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350453/","name":"Jake Gyllenhaal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053530/","name":"Tom Ford"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251339/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053530/","name":"Tom Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7216022/","name":"Austin Wright"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La vérité
Instynkt
Instinct
programme.desc:
La vérité: Directed by Hirokazu Koreeda. With Catherine Deneuve, Juliette Binoche, Ethan Hawke, Clémentine Grenier. A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8323120/","name":"La vérité","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJjMTVhMzMtOTQwNC00MzVkLWE3YjMtMjkwYTQ0YzEyMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY3Nzc0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8323120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MartinHafer"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly okay....and not much more","reviewBody":"The Japanese filmmaker Hirokazu Koreeda is famous for focusing on some of the darker aspects of what it is to be Japanese. Some folks in his homeland (including some politicians) have criticized his films for exposing these problem....though many film buffs have loved these same films. It's surprising, then, when you watch "The Truth"....not just because it has an all French and American cast but because unlike his films such as "Like Father, Like Son" and "Shoplifters", he DOES pull his punches and more often than not avoids pushing boundaries! As a result, my daughter and I enjoyed the film but were also very disappointed.

The film stars Catherine Deneuve and Juliet Binoche as a self-absorbed mother and her frustrated daughter during a visit. And, amazingly, by the end of the story, nothing much happens....few sparks and the big confrontation scene you expect (because the daughter deservedly resents her mother) never really materialize and the mother somehow receives absolution though she did little to merit it....again, NOT like what you'd expect in a Hirokazu Koreeda movie.

Overall, the acting was good but the story itself a bit flat.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6162,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-10-11","keywords":"aging actress,acting,tortoise,dog,title is not in english","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1405009689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlmODk2MjktMWNmNC00M2U1LWJkOTUtMjUwNGJiMDVhZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlmODk2MjktMWNmNC00M2U1LWJkOTUtMjUwNGJiMDVhZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000366/","name":"Catherine Deneuve"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466153/","name":"Hirokazu Koreeda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029856/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0567389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0705123/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466153/","name":"Hirokazu Koreeda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7408787/","name":"Ken Liu"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fellwechselzeit
Pora wylinki
Fellwechselzeit
programme.desc: Fellwechselzeit: Directed by Sabrina Mertens. With Zelda Espenschied, Miriam Schiweck, Freya Kreutzkam, Bernd Wolf. The still life of a family in 57 pictures. Germany in the 1970ies. Stephanie is an intelligent and lively child. But she leads an isolated life with her parents, marked by the symbiotic bonding with her mentally unstable mother. A mother who has never really left her own childhood behind and who lives amidst things of the past and the memories connected to them. Stephanie's relationship with her father is one of mistrust. The passing years only bring aging, but no future. Unspoken thoughts lurk underneath the surface of everyday life. So Stephanie retreats into a dark world of barbaric fantasies, that are nourished by the traces of the past and only belong to her alone. One day, however, Stephanie's secret invades the family's reality." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11758900/","name":"Fellwechselzeit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFkZGQ2ODctZjViOS00Yjc0LThjZjctZjg1YzliNTRlMDVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODU2NjIzMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The still life of a family in 57 pictures. programme.title: Baby God
Dziecko w drodze
Baby Done
programme.desc:
Baby God: Directed by Hannah Olson. With Wendi Babst, Quincy Fortier, Brad Gulko, Cathy Holm. For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11916166/","name":"Baby God","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyZTA0ZGQtN2NiZC00NmIxLWE4MWUtYzM0NmY0YjY4ZjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIxMDY2NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11916166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbankscma"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why did he do it?","reviewBody":"This is a documentary not a mystery film, so I won't call this review a spoiler.

Why he did it may have been was partially answered, but not discussed was that we all want to be known for being successful. Fortier realized that with his sperm mixed in the chance of success increased.

As he became known for being successful (with lots of profit to boot) he kept doing what worked... mixing sperm specimens.

As mentioned, DNA testing was nonexistent at that time so he knew he'd be remembered for what he was: a VERY successful fertilization doctor.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime"],"datePublished":"2020-12-02","keywords":"children","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3083518233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11916166/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jbankscma","dateCreated":"2020-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why did he do it?","reviewBody":"This is a documentary not a mystery film, so I won't call this review a spoiler.

Why he did it may have been was partially answered, but not discussed was that we all want to be known for being successful. Fortier realized that with his sperm mixed in the chance of success increased.

As he became known for being successful (with lots of profit to boot) he kept doing what worked... mixing sperm specimens.

As mentioned, DNA testing was nonexistent at that time so he knew he'd be remembered for what he was: a VERY successful fertilization doctor.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime"],"datePublished":"2020-12-02","keywords":"children","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3083518233","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12116920/","name":"Wendi Babst","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11677441/","name":"Quincy Fortier","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12116923/","name":"Brad Gulko"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2126074/","name":"Hannah Olson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0833919/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139821/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098782/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601012/","name":"CeCe Moore"],"duration":"PT1H18M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La Gomera
Oszustki
The Hustle
programme.desc:
La Gomera: Directed by Corneliu Porumboiu. With Vlad Ivanov, Catrinel Marlon, Rodica Lazar, Sabin Tambrea. Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7921248/","name":"La Gomera","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4MjM1NTctMmQwYy00ZDE3LTllOTAtODRlNjJkMTg1MDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7921248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjfhhh"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end","reviewBody":"Cristi is a middle aged undercover police officer with mommy issues who is trying to find the location of some stolen money. So he goes to a remote island to learn a whistling language that will allow him to communicate with the criminals from a distance. There he rekindles a relationship with his old flame and his priorities change. As both the criminals and his colleagues are onto Cristi what choices will he make to come out clean of his predicament? A clever game of cops and robbers ensues.

Summing up this multi layered, not always coherent plot, is not an easy task. THE WHISTLERS takes a long time to get going but it's many elements come together building up to something special. Heavy on movie references it is heavily inspired by Tarantino movies, although the style of the cinematography is rather dull.

The script on paper must look great, but this is the case where a writer should let go of his work and let someone else direct. Cornelliu Porumboiu helmed 13 films but seems to be still searching for his directing style. While all the cast do their job well, the motives of their characters for the majority of the film are obscure to say the least.

But if this is the originality you are looking for THE WHISTLERS is for you. With good timing and a genuine sense of wit it is a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5114,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-13","keywords":"female rear nudity,canary islands,police detective,policeman,police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1044168473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIyOWU0MWYtY2IzZS00ZWMwLThkMDgtYWU5MDA2MjVmMWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIyOWU0MWYtY2IzZS00ZWMwLThkMDgtYWU5MDA2MjVmMWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412096/","name":"Vlad Ivanov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5054840/","name":"Catrinel Marlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1120715/","name":"Rodica Lazar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717949/","name":"Corneliu Porumboiu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180401/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0245364/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717949/","name":"Corneliu Porumboiu"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Nobadi: Directed by Karl Markovics. With Heinz Trixner, Borhanulddin Hassan Zadeh, Konstanze Dutzi, Maria Fliri. programme.title: Favolacce
Złe baśnie
Favolacce
programme.desc: Favolacce: Directed by Damiano D'Innocenzo, Fabio D'Innocenzo. With Elio Germano, Tommaso Di Cola, Giulietta Rebeggiani, Gabriel Montesi. A few families living out on a limb in the suburbs of Rome. Tensions here can explode at any time; ultimately it's the children who bring about the collapse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8526370/","name":"Favolacce","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDhmMWE4MjktMGVlNi00ZWU3LWI3MTktZjk5ODkzY2M2NWFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTQwMDA5NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A few families living out on a limb in the suburbs of Rome. Tensions here can explode at any time; ultimately it's the children who bring about the collapse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8526370/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kiddo_bear"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"An extraordinary look at ordinary lives","reviewBody":"My personal favorite of the 2020 Berlin International Film Festival and winner of the Berlinale Bear for best script. The film introduces itself as: A true story inspired by a false story. The false story is not very inspired. Sounds mysterious? It better be, for this is a film enjoyed more the less you know. Okay, I'll give you this much: a dark look at life in the subjrbs outside Rome, where people's aspiration clash with reality. The story of a summer broken down into a sequence of immersive scenes, each containing its own drama and driven by an atmosphere of suspense. All is mostly viewed through the eyes of the kids. Highly recommended! On a side note: this is the second film of the D'Innocenzo Brothers that I've seen, and it is astonishing to observe how much they've matured as film makers and story tellers. Their first film - La Terra de'l abbastanza - had all the pieces but lacked a forceful plot to tie them together. Favolacce deliverd this force, in a unique way.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6911,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-06-15","keywords":"unhappy family,disfunctional family,rome italy,disturbing,malaise","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1897774617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZjQxODYtZjllYi00ZTU4LWEyZTctN2Q5YWYwZDljNjA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVkZjQxODYtZjllYi00ZTU4LWEyZTctN2Q5YWYwZDljNjA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314554/","name":"Elio Germano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10971622/","name":"Tommaso Di Cola"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8584079/","name":"Giulietta Rebeggiani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4462605/","name":"Damiano D'Innocenzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4461870/","name":"Fabio D'Innocenzo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0380415/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280251/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4462605/","name":"Damiano D'Innocenzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4461870/","name":"Fabio D'Innocenzo"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Killing of Two Lovers
Zabójstwo dwojga kochanków
The Killing of Two Lovers

programme.desc:
Baby God: Directed by Hannah Olson. With Wendi Babst, Quincy Fortier, Brad Gulko, Cathy Holm. For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11916166/","name":"Baby God","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyZTA0ZGQtN2NiZC00NmIxLWE4MWUtYzM0NmY0YjY4ZjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIxMDY2NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11916166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbankscma"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why did he do it?","reviewBody":"This is a documentary not a mystery film, so I won't call this review a spoiler.

Why he did it may have been was partially answered, but not discussed was that we all want to be known for being successful. Fortier realized that with his sperm mixed in the chance of success increased.

As he became known for being successful (with lots of profit to boot) he kept doing what worked... mixing sperm specimens.

As mentioned, DNA testing was nonexistent at that time so he knew he'd be remembered for what he was: a VERY successful fertilization doctor.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime"],"datePublished":"2020-12-02","keywords":"children","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3083518233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. programme.title: La Gomera
Oszustki
The Hustle
programme.desc:
La Gomera: Directed by Corneliu Porumboiu. With Vlad Ivanov, Catrinel Marlon, Rodica Lazar, Sabin Tambrea. Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7921248/","name":"La Gomera","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4MjM1NTctMmQwYy00ZDE3LTllOTAtODRlNjJkMTg1MDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7921248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjfhhh"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end","reviewBody":"Cristi is a middle aged undercover police officer with mommy issues who is trying to find the location of some stolen money. So he goes to a remote island to learn a whistling language that will allow him to communicate with the criminals from a distance. There he rekindles a relationship with his old flame and his priorities change. As both the criminals and his colleagues are onto Cristi what choices will he make to come out clean of his predicament? A clever game of cops and robbers ensues.

Summing up this multi layered, not always coherent plot, is not an easy task. THE WHISTLERS takes a long time to get going but it's many elements come together building up to something special. Heavy on movie references it is heavily inspired by Tarantino movies, although the style of the cinematography is rather dull.

The script on paper must look great, but this is the case where a writer should let go of his work and let someone else direct. Cornelliu Porumboiu helmed 13 films but seems to be still searching for his directing style. While all the cast do their job well, the motives of their characters for the majority of the film are obscure to say the least.

But if this is the originality you are looking for THE WHISTLERS is for you. With good timing and a genuine sense of wit it is a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5114,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-13","keywords":"female rear nudity,canary islands,police detective,policeman,police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1044168473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIyOWU0MWYtY2IzZS00ZWMwLThkMDgtYWU5MDA2MjVmMWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIyOWU0MWYtY2IzZS00ZWMwLThkMDgtYWU5MDA2MjVmMWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412096/","name":"Vlad Ivanov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5054840/","name":"Catrinel Marlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1120715/","name":"Rodica Lazar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717949/","name":"Corneliu Porumboiu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180401/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0245364/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717949/","name":"Corneliu Porumboiu"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7921248, Title: La Gomera, --- Description: La Gomera: Directed by Corneliu Porumboiu. With Vlad Ivanov, Catrinel Marlon, Rodica Lazar, Sabin Tambrea. Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7921248/","name":"La Gomera","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4MjM1NTctMmQwYy00ZDE3LTllOTAtODRlNjJkMTg1MDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7921248/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mjfhhh","dateCreated":"2019-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end","reviewBody":"Cristi is a middle aged undercover police officer with mommy issues who is trying to find the location of some stolen money. So he goes to a remote island to learn a whistling language that will allow him to communicate with the criminals from a distance. There he rekindles a relationship with his old flame and his priorities change. As both the criminals and his colleagues are onto Cristi what choices will he make to come out clean of his predicament? A clever game of cops and robbers ensues.

Summing up this multi layered, not always coherent plot, is not an easy task. THE WHISTLERS takes a long time to get going but it's many elements come together building up to something special. Heavy on movie references it is heavily inspired by Tarantino movies, although the style of the cinematography is rather dull.

The script on paper must look great, but this is the case where a writer should let go of his work and let someone else direct. Cornelliu Porumboiu helmed 13 films but seems to be still searching for his directing style. While all the cast do their job well, the motives of their characters for the majority of the film are obscure to say the least.

But if this is the originality you are looking for THE WHISTLERS is for you. programme.title: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
Łowcy zombie
Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse: Directed by Christopher Landon. With Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller, Joey Morgan, Sarah Dumont. Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1727776/","name":"Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY4NjczNjE4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk0MjQ5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1727776/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's a lot of fun!","reviewBody":"If there's one horror movie you need to see in theaters this Halloween weekend, make it Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse. Sure, the film won't win any awards for a great screenplay or nuanced performances, but sometimes you need to watch a movie that you can just sit down and enjoy. In that regard, Scouts delivers. It's totally over-the-top and ridiculously entertaining and the closest version of an American Shaun of the Dead there will ever be. I mean, if the zombie cats in the trailer didn't pull you in, then you're probably not the intended audience for this film. While there are some adolescent gags that don't quite work, most of the jokes are quite funny, some even inspired. There are things in this film that you've never seen in a zombie flick before, and considering the lack of originality in recent zombie fare in film and TV, that's quite an accomplishment. There's also an endearing quality to this film through the three boy scouts relationship that ground the film emotionally. Underneath all the gore and gross out gags, Scouts is a coming-of-age comedy with heart, and while it might not work for everyone, this viewer had a blast.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2015-10-30","keywords":"zombie,boy scout,hardware store,friendship between boys,blonde","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2060038937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMTc0NzM3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1NzI2NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMTc0NzM3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1NzI2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the eve of their last camp-out, three scouts discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4446467/","name":"Tye Sheridan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2383250/","name":"Logan Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6368720/","name":"Joey Morgan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0484907/","name":"Christopher Landon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284585/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933144/","name":"Carrie Lee Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595088/","name":"Emi Mochizuki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0484907/","name":"Christopher Landon"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ex Machina
Ex Machina
programme.desc:
Ex Machina: Directed by Alex Garland. With Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno. A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0470752/","name":"Ex Machina","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzc0OTIxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI3NzU2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0470752/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Different Sort of Picture","reviewBody":"Ex Machina (2015) 

*** 1/2 (out of 4) 

A different sort of science fiction film, a programmer (Domhnall Gleeson) wins what is basically a lottery to go and spend a week with his company's owner (Oscar Isaac). The owner, Nathan, pretty much created a search engine but he's gone a step further by creating an artificial intelligent woman named Ava (Alicia Vikander) who the programmer is supposed to examine and question.

EX MACHINA pretty much came out of nowhere and became a good hit across the world and I'm rather shocked that it did. Usually dumb science fiction movies with a lot of mindless actions are the ones that make money and not those that features very little to no action and instead just dialogue and thought. What really sets this film apart is the fact that it asks more questions than anything else and it expects the viewer to think about those questions and the impact that certain actions could have.

The visual style of the film is quite impressive and it's certainly a very interesting film to just look at. The music score is quite haunting and perfectly captures the mood of the film. There's the terrific cinematography that pulls you into the setting. The special effects are also extremely impressive. I loved the set and the look of this compound but the special effects are the real star. If you didn't believe that you were really looking at and operating with real artificial intelligent creatures then the entire film just wouldn't have the same feeling.

Then there are the performances, which are a major plus. Gleeson pretty much plays the role that is typically a nerd but the film never lowers the character to that simple term and instead makes him a very interesting person. Even the role of the billionaire played by Isaac isn't what you'd typically see and the actor brings a certainly coldness to the part. Vikander is flawless and steals the picture in her role.

EX MACHINA certainly won't be a movie for everyone but it's good to think about the questions that it asks."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":507744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-01-21","keywords":"artificial intelligence,turing test,minimal cast,robot,robot human relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi744337689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjQzNzk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE4NjM0NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjQzNzk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE4NjM0NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer is selected to participate in a breakthrough experiment in artificial intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breathtaking female A.I.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727304/","name":"Domhnall Gleeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1209966/","name":"Oscar Isaac"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390816/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="
